book.name: Расписание занятий
book.get_query: SELECT si.id, d.name as "День недели", ti.name as "Время", g.name as "Группа", c.name as "Название дисциплины", p.name as "Номер аудитории", te.name as "Преподаватель" FROM schedule_items si INNER JOIN courses c ON si.course_id = c.id INNER JOIN teachers te ON si.teacher_id = te.id INNER JOIN places p ON si.place_id = p.id INNER JOIN times ti ON si.time_id = ti.id INNER JOIN days d ON si.day_id = d.id INNER JOIN groups g ON si.group_id = g.id ORDER BY d.id, ti.id, g.id
